sys_ui_message.message:
When you resign from our employ, you must complete a Absa Pension Fund Withdrawal Benefit Claim Form indicating whether you wish to:
- Transfer your share of the Fund to your new employerâ€™s pension and/or provident fund. Not taxable. - Transfer your share of the Fund to a retirement annuity fund. Not taxable. - Transfer your money to a pension preservation fund. Not taxable. - Leave your Fund credit in the Fund until a later date ('Defer' your withdrawal date). Not taxable. - Take your share of the Fund in cash (taxable). - Please contact the Pension fund on 0860 100 380
If you leave our employ without completing the form, the pension fund will employ tracing agents to obtain your withdrawal option. To find out how your pension fund savings are growing in our fund, please register here: https://acamember.sanlam.co.za. Refer to the attached user guide: How to access the Absa Pension Fund site.
